text: Eghtɨ kamaghɨn God ia damutɨ ia navir amɨrɨzimɨn ikiam. Egh ia Krais Iesus ko poroghɨv deragh ikiam, eghtɨ tuavir kamɨn Godɨn navir amɨrɨzim deravɨra ian naviba ko nɨghnɨzibagh eghuvtɨ da bar deravɨra ikiam. God navir amɨrɨzir e ganɨngizir kam, a bar bizir aghuim, ezɨ navir amɨrɨzir kam gumazibar fofozim bar a gafira.
